name: Stat Manager (Full)
description:
A helper tool designed for the popular board game Shadows of Brimstone. Forget about managing cards and cumbersome tokens - check out this new app!
Features include:
* Choosing from one of the base starter classes and characters in the Swamps of Death Expansion
* Managing Items, Abilities, Injuries and Sidebag Items
* Includes base counters for stats such as HP, Sanity and EXP.
* Expansion specific items, characters and abilities
* Maintain multiple characters and all their relevant stats
